scheduleFreeConsultation.disclaimer: *Disclaimer: The free consultation does not establish an attorney-client relationship. Legal advice is provided only upon engagement of services.

whyChooseUs.heading:
Let Our
Experience
Be Your Guide
whyChooseUs.description:
Legal Solutions for Families and Businesses

At the Law Office of Jonathan Miller, we specialize in estate planning, business law, and providing personalized legal services to clients in Salt Lake City, Phoenix, and beyond.

Whether you need to protect your family's future, navigate complex business transactions, or ensure compliance with state laws, we offer trusted counsel and tailored solutions.

With years of experience in multiple states, we're here to ensure your legal needs are met with professionalism and care.

items.comment: “ I hired Jon to update my family trust and to revise two operating agreements for my LLC's. Jon was very professional, courteous, kind, showed integrity and was reasonably priced. Jon gave me some advice on how to handle a problem we had with one of my LLC's, I was very impressed! I was so pleased with his work I referred my sister, brother and mother-in law to him! ”

ourServices.heading: Our Services
ourServices.description: We strive to offer tailored legal services to meet your specific goals. Whether you’re looking to <br class='d-none d-xl-inline-block'/>protect your family’s future through estate planning or navigate the complexities of business law, <br class='d-none d-xl-inline-block'/>we provide personalized, expert guidance every step of the way.

estatePlanning.heading: Estate Planning
estatePlanning.description:
Looking for straightforward legal advice you can trust? Whether it’s securing your family’s future or navigating
business challenges, we’re here to help. Let’s work together to find solutions that fit your unique needs.
Schedule a consultation today and take the next step with confidence.

We make the estate planning process easy and efficient. After an initial consultation, we’ll craft a plan tailored
to your needs and meet with you online to review everything before signing.

tiles.title: Wills and Trust
tiles.detail: Ensure your assets are distributed according to your wishes.

tiles.title: Power of Attorney
tiles.detail: Make sure the right people can make decisions for you in critical moments.

tiles.title: Trust Funding
tiles.detail: Ensure that your trust is properly funded to avoid probate.

businessSupport.heading: Business
businessSupport.description: From formation to acquisition, your business needs the right legal foundation to succeed. <br class='d-none d-xl-inline-block'/>We offer comprehensive business law services to protect your interests and help you thrive in <br class='d-none d-xl-inline-block'/>today’s competitive landscape.

tiles.title: Business Formation
tiles.detail: Whether you’re starting a sole proprietorship, LLC, or corporation, we’ll help you get set up the right way.

tiles.title: Contracts & Agreements
tiles.detail: Protect your business with properly drafted contracts, from employment agreements to partnership deals.

tiles.title: Mergers & Acquisitions
tiles.detail: We provide expert guidance on buying, selling, and merging businesses.

tiles.title: Ongoing Counsel
tiles.detail: Need legal advice as your business grows? We’re here to help with strategic support on an as-needed basis.

aboutCeo.heading: Legal Expertise with a Personal Touch
aboutCeo.name: Jonathan Miller
aboutCeo.details:
Hi, I’m Jon, the founding attorney here at J G Miller Law, where I’ve combined over a decade of legal experience with a passion for helping families and businesses succeed. I’ve been proudly licensed in Utah since 2013 and recently joined the Arizona bar in 2024, so whether you’re in the mountains of Utah or the deserts of Arizona, I’m here to guide you through the legal process—virtually or in person!


As a father of 4 and the owner of an English Cream Golden Retriever, my days (and nights) are full of fun and excitement. More importantly, I know how important it is to protect what matters most. When I’m not helping clients with estate plans or business strategies, you’ll likely find me cracking dad jokes or spending quality time with my family in the mountains.


I’m a big believer that legal services don’t have to be intimidating. I’m here to make the process as smooth and accessible as possible, whether we’re meeting online or in person. My goal is to help you feel confident about your future—while maybe sneaking in a joke or two along the way.


So, if you’re ready to plan for your family’s future or take your business to the next level, let’s chat! I promise, I’ll keep the legal jargon to a minimum (but no guarantees on the dad jokes).
